sentences.english: The carrying amounts of the Foundation's other receivables are denominated in Hong Kong dollars.
sentences.chinese: 本基金其他應收款的賬面值以港元單位。

sentences.english: There are not so many toxic assets on the banks' books in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在加拿大，銀行賬面資本中沒有那麼多的有毒資產。

sentences.english: If investment rates do not change, Japan will move into current-account deficit.
sentences.chinese: 如果投資率沒有改變，日本將會進入賬面赤字時代。

sentences.english: The aggregate carrying value of the business reputation apportioned to the above-mentioned asset groups;
sentences.chinese: 分攤到上述資產組的商譽的賬面價值合計。

sentences.english: But that means it may get only half of the profit that it has on the books.
sentences.chinese: 但是這意味着銀行可能只能得到賬面所計的一半收益。

sentences.english: We spent much less space on payback or return on book.
sentences.chinese: 我們花費了少得多的空間於回收期和賬面報酬率。

sentences.english: But the vast majority of loans have not.
sentences.chinese: 而其餘大量的貸款還沒有降低賬面價值。

sentences.english: Behind all this is a collapse in paper wealth and breakdown in credit (see chart).
sentences.chinese: 這一切的背後是賬面財富的崩潰和信貸衰竭。

sentences.english: In a huge EGM of interested parties at Hogwarts Hall, Harry found that his book value had increased.
sentences.chinese: 在會上哈利發現他的賬面價值已然上升。

sentences.english: The directors consider that the carrying amount of other payables approximates their fair value.
sentences.chinese: 董事會認爲，其他應付款的賬面值與公平值相若。

sentences.english: The interest accrues on the capital invested in the carrying inventory.
sentences.chinese: 利息累計賬面存貨投資的資本。

sentences.english: Little girls wear veils while carrying Hannah Montana backpacks to school.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩戴面紗，而賬面孟漢娜揹包去上學。

sentences.english: They escape tax by the pseudophase of book loss.
sentences.chinese: 很多外企製造賬面虧損假相，實則爲逃避稅收。

sentences.english: But at these prices, it is difficult to avoid a paper trail.
sentences.chinese: 但是，以這樣的價錢，很難不在個人賬面上露出馬腳。

sentences.english: Investment banks are mostly measured on their price-to-book value.
sentences.chinese: 投資銀行通常經由賬面價值來衡量。

sentences.english: Many of these are illiquid and still booked at their original, inflated prices.
sentences.chinese: 許多證券缺乏流動性，且賬面值還是初始的高價。
